name: UTIER, Petitioner v. FINANCIAL OVERSIGHT BOARD, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
UTIER, Petitioner
v.
FINANCIAL OVERSIGHT BOARD, et al.
attorneys: Upon consideration of the August 29, 2019 motions for divided argument, a total of 80 minutes is allotted for consolidated oral argument on both questions presented, and the time is divided as follows: 20 minutes to the Financial Oversight and Management Board, 20 minutes to the Solicitor General, 30 minutes to Aurelius Investment, LLC, et al., and 10 minutes to UTIER.
casebody.head_matter:
UTIER, Petitioner
v.
FINANCIAL OVERSIGHT BOARD, et al.
No. 18-1521
Supreme Court of the United States.
September 11, 2019
Upon consideration of the August 29, 2019 motions for divided argument, a total of 80 minutes is allotted for consolidated oral argument on both questions presented, and the time is divided as follows: 20 minutes to the Financial Oversight and Management Board, 20 minutes to the Solicitor General, 30 minutes to Aurelius Investment, LLC, et al., and 10 minutes to UTIER.
